Comprehensive Waste Management Solutions

Collection & Transportation

Safe, scheduled collection using GPS-tracked, compliant vehicles. Barcode system for tracking.

Autoclaving Sterilization

High-pressure steam sterilization renders infectious waste non-hazardous before disposal.

Shredding

Post-treatment shredding ensures waste is unrecognizable and reduces volume.

Sharps Management

Secure collection in puncture-proof containers and appropriate treatment (encapsulation/autoclaving).

Waste Segregation Training

Empowering healthcare staff with knowledge for proper waste segregation at source.

Documentation & Reporting

Meticulous record-keeping and reporting for regulatory compliance and peace of mind.

Consultancy & Support

Expert advice on optimizing your facility's waste management plan and compliance.

Emergency Response

Prompt and safe handling of unexpected waste removal needs or spills.

Eco-Friendly Disposal

Final disposal of treated residue in secured landfills, minimizing environmental impact.

Partnering for a Healthier Yavatmal

Focus on patient care, knowing your bio-medical waste is managed responsibly, safely, and sustainably by Jaywant Industries.
